document.full_text: citigroup inc , which needed $45 billion in u.s. government handouts to survive the financial crisis, is about to paper over a visible remnant of its near-failure: its single-digit share price.
document.title: citi seeks shares' past glory with reverse split
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc , which needed $45 billion in u.s. government handouts to survive the financial crisis, is about to paper over a visible remnant of its near-failure: its single-digit share price.
